summary: The integrations package supplies adapters that connect the Ragas evaluation framework with external tracing, observability, and data platforms. It offers a configurable singleton for Helicone headers, wrappers for LangChain and LlamaIndex components, utilities to run evaluations and upload results to LangSmith, and a bridge to send execution traces and scores to Opik. Together these adapters standardize APIâ€‘key handling, dataset conversion, and result formatting so RAG workflows can be evaluated and reported across multiple services.
business_intent: Enable developers to seamlessly incorporate RAG evaluation metrics into popular monitoring and analytics services, simplifying the setup of tracing, score logging, and dataset management while maintaining a consistent evaluation experience across different toolchains.
